<br>
There were <h8>`r round(sexassaults_region$last12mos/12,0)`</h8> sexual assaults reported per month in 2021 across every Southern California police jurisdiction, according to data that law enforcement agencies report to the state of Californina. In 2019, the data show that number was <h8>`r round(sexassaults_region$total19/12,0)`</h8> a month.

<subhead>A closer look at Southern California sexual assaults where you live</subhead>

The risk is not the same area to area.

ABC7's data team looked at data that every local police agency reported to the California Department of Justice through 2021, the latest date for which records are available.

The map color codes each community by the vehicle theft rate in 2021. You can also click the box in the bottom right corner to see neighborhoods by the number of reported sexual assaults.

Click on any area neighborhood on the map to see detailed numbers, rates and trends.

You can find your neighborhood by using the box at the top of the map to search for any street, place, landmark or zip code to zoom to that location.

<br>

```{r cars, echo=FALSE,out.width='100%',out.height='600'}
# sexassault MAP

# Set bins for numbers of crimes for sexassaults map
sexassaultbins1 <- c(0,
                20,
                30,
                40,
                50,
                150)
sexassaultbins2 <- c(0,
                10,
                25,
                50,
                100,
                150)
sexassaultpal1 <- colorBin(c("#99a0a5",
                             "#2787d6",
                             "#0058f6",
                             "#003ca6",
                             "#00215c"), sexassaults_region$rate_last12, bins = sexassaultbins1,na.color = "#51585f")

sexassaultpal2 <- colorBin(c("#99a0a5",
                             "#2787d6",
                             "#0058f6",
                             "#003ca6",
                             "#00215c"), sexassaults_region$last12mos, bins = sexassaultbins2,na.color = "#51585f")

# Create quick labels for sexassaults map
sexassaultlabel <- paste(sep="",
                     "<popuptitle>",
                     sexassaults_region$last12mos,
                     " sexual assaults</popuptitle><br>",
                     " in 2021 in <b>",
                     sexassaults_region$place,
                     "</b> home to an estimated ",
                     prettyNum(sexassaults_region$population, big.mark=","),
                     " people.

# Creating police beats map for types of crimes
socal_sexassault_map <- leaflet(sexassaults_region, options = leafletOptions(zoomControl = FALSE, zoomSnap = 0.5, zoomDelta=0.5)) %>%
  htmlwidgets::onRender("function(el, x) {
L.control.zoom({ position: 'topright' }).addTo(this)
}") %>%
  setView(-118.24, 34.05, zoom = 10) %>% 
  addProviderTiles(provider = "CartoDB.Positron") %>%
  addPolygons(color = "white", 
              popup = sexassaultlabel,
              popupOptions = popupOptions(maxWidth ="200", 
                                          minWidth ="200"),
              weight = 2, 
              smoothFactor = 0.5,
              opacity = 0.6, 
              fillOpacity = 0.6,
              fillColor = ~sexassaultpal1(rate_last12),
              group="Rate") %>% 
    addPolygons(color = "white", 
              popup = sexassaultlabel,
              popupOptions = popupOptions(maxWidth ="200", 
                                          minWidth ="200"),
              weight = 2, 
              smoothFactor = 0.5,
              opacity = 0.6, 
              fillOpacity = 0.6,
              fillColor = ~sexassaultpal2(last12mos),
              group="Number") %>% 
    addSearchOSM(options = searchOptions(autoCollapse=FALSE, minLength = 3,zoom=13, position="topleft")) %>%
    onRender("function(el, x) {
        $('input.search-input')[0].placeholder = 'Search street, place or zip code'
        }") %>%
  addLegend(opacity = 0.6,
            values = sexassaults_region$rate_last12, 
            pal = sexassaultpal1,
            position = "bottomleft", 
            title = paste(sep="","<popuptitle>Sexual Assault Rate<br><popupchatter>Sexual Assaults/100K people<br>Citywide: ",sexassaults_city$rate_last12),
            group = "Rate",
            className = "info legend Rate") %>%
  addLegend(opacity = 0.6,
            values = sexassaults_region$last12mos, 
            pal = sexassaultpal2,
            position = "bottomleft", 
            title = paste(sep="","<popuptitle>Sexual Assaults<br><popupchatter>Total sexual assaults<br>Citywide: ",sexassaults_city$last12mos),
            group = "Number",
            className = "info legend Number") %>%
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("Rate","Number"),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE),
    position = 'bottomright') %>% hideGroup(c("Number")) %>%
   htmlwidgets::onRender("
      function(el, x) {
         var updateLegend = function () {
            var selectedGroup = document.querySelectorAll('input:checked')[0].nextSibling.innerText.substr(1);

            document.querySelectorAll('.legend').forEach(a => a.hidden=true);
            document.querySelectorAll('.legend').forEach(l => {
               if (l.classList.contains(selectedGroup)) l.hidden=false;
            });
         };
         updateLegend();
         this.on('baselayerchange', el => updateLegend());
      }"
   )
socal_sexassault_map
```
